If you prefer a comedy, I recommend checking out "Isn't She Great". This movie stars Bette Midler and Nathan Lane. Adapted from Jacqueline Susann's best-selling novel Valley of the Dolls, this film tells the story of a woman named Jackie who becomes obsessed with the lifestyles of wealthy women in Hollywood.

If you prefer a drama, I recommend checking out "Capote". This movie stars Kwesi Ameyaw, Michael J. Burg, Marshall Bell, Amy Ryan, Catherine Keener, Bruce Greenwood, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Bob Balaban.
